column5: Went 2 for 3 on pike yesturday the first catch was on a tip-up baited with a 9 inch dead portuguese sardine, the second on a pink tube jig the third was also on a pink tube jig but lost him. The first pike almost spooled the hole tip-up the second one was caught in the hut, I felt a little nibble so I looked down the hole and there he was I watched him cruise around then he decided to take the jig as I'm watching so I let him then I set the hook that happened twice and I did see more under the hut wow I've never seen anything like it.. Heading back out today...
Awesome Video..   Nice job on bringing him in
....Very nice.
cool ,   ill have to bring the video camera next time way better than just  pics !    thanks for sharing.
Excellent video!  Love the little caption boxes....specially the last one....lol.   Great stuff....that pike eally did nearly spool ya!   thanks for sharing.
Very cool, she sure took a lot of line on you. Thanks for putting that together
Great report and video tph  Give ya 11 out of 10 on this one Super job.... keep them coming Leechman
that pike must have taken A LOT of line
Great video nice looking pike  Rob
Cool video Bro
awesome!  cheers!
SHWEET!!  cheers HD
My arms were getting sore whatching you. Good thing you had lots of line on that small spool. Great video. Scooter
nice vid !!
gatta love it when the fish takes off and just dosent stop!   verry cool video!
Thanks guys!!!   that fish did take alot of line after it was all said and done I had to walk and straighten the line out I would say around 30yds worth, thanks again and more vid's to come...
Nice video & even nicer catch !!!!   well done...cheers
Man that was a nice pike. Lots of line out, how many FOW were you in?
Thanks, 10 feet of water
nice job on the fish and the vid
NIce video! The comments are hilarious.
Loved the video!!! Great stuff!
nice video good job on the fish
a good way to start the morning I had to laugh when Dave was mentioned I hope he sees it that would be to funny would you donate it to another who needs a shirt?
